description: We are looking for a skilled Front-end React JS Developer to join our team. You will be working on exciting projects in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
aboutUs: At Eptikar IT Solutions, we foster innovation and embrace collaboration to create tech-driven solutions that inspire change.
jobDescription: Develop responsive web applications using React.js, collaborate with back-end developers, and ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
jobRequirements: 2+ years of experience in front-end development using React.js, proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and experience with RESTful APIs.

description: Join us as a Back-end Node JS Developer to build and maintain server-side logic for scalable applications. Collaborate with a passionate team to deliver high-quality products.
aboutUs: At Eptikar IT Solutions, we build cutting-edge solutions with a focus on innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction.
jobDescription: Develop and maintain back-end services and APIs, integrate front-end components with server-side logic, and optimize performance for scalability.
jobRequirements: 2+ years of experience with Node.js and Express, solid understanding of database systems like MongoDB, and experience with RESTful APIs.

description: We are seeking a seasoned MERN Stack Developer to lead full-stack development projects. You will design and build complex web applications with an emphasis on scalability and performance.
aboutUs: At Eptikar IT Solutions, we combine expertise and passion to create transformative digital experiences for our clients.
jobDescription: Lead the design and development of full-stack applications using the MERN stack, collaborate across teams to implement new features, and ensure high-performance web apps.
jobRequirements: 5+ years of full-stack development experience with MERN stack, deep knowledge of JavaScript, and strong problem-solving skills.

description: We are looking for a creative UI/UX Designer to enhance user experiences through visually appealing and intuitive designs.
aboutUs: At Eptikar IT Solutions, we pride ourselves on creating beautiful, user-centric digital products that solve real problems.
jobDescription: Design user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications, collaborate with developers to ensure seamless integration, and conduct user research to guide design decisions.
jobRequirements: 1+ years of experience in UI/UX design, proficiency in design tools like Figma, Adobe XD, and a strong portfolio of previous design work.
